summary: The module contains a suite of unit tests that verify the correct integration and operation of a Stable Diffusion 3 image generation pipeline enhanced with Parameterized Attention Guidance (PAG). Tests cover component assembly, projection fusion, layer modifications, handling of prompts and negative prompts, and processing of text embeddings.
business_intent: Automate regression testing to ensure the enhanced diffusion pipeline works reliably, preventing defects in production and maintaining consistent image generation quality for downstream applications.
